column1: # Sample meta data sheet for Cutlery. Tab-delimited
# Name: unique (human friendly & descriptive) sample name
# Group: sample group for pooled processing
# Fq1/2: fastq files for read1 and 2, Fq2==NULL if single-end
# Ctrl: Name of control sample for peak calling
# PeakMode: Peak calling mode {factor,histone,NULL}. NULL for no peak calling
# PeakOpt: string for peak callin option to use in cnr.peakCallTF.sh or cnr.peakCallHistone.sh. e.g. "-FDR 0.0001"
